content: अप्रयुक्त {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Not used or employed, not applied. {@--2@} Wrongly used, as a word. {@--3@} (In <ab>Rhet.</ab>) Rare, unusual (as a word when used in a particular sense or gender though that sense or gender be sanctioned by lexicographers); अप्रयुक्तं तथाम्नातमपि कविभिर्नादृतं; तथा मन्ये दैवतोस्य पिशाचो राक्षसोऽथवा . where the <ab>mas.</ab> gender of दैवत, though sanctioned (by <ls>Amara</ls>), is not used by poets and is, therefore, अप्रयुक्त.
